narrative.narrative: The Société Générale des Transports Aériens (SGTA) was a French airline founded in 1919. It operated until 1933 when its assets were incorporated in the newly created Air France airline.

prefereds.aircrafts: Farman F.60 Goliath,Farman F.70,Farman F.121 Jabiru,Farman F.170 Jabiru
